subject: Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
American Pharoah (Race Horse)
Belmont Stakes
lead_paragraph: For 37 long years, as the Triple Crown trophy waited for a permanent home, those handling it almost always did so wearing cotton gloves. “It shows fingerprints easily,” an executive said.
snippet: For 37 long years, as the Triple Crown trophy waited for a permanent home, those handling it almost always did so wearing cotton gloves. “It shows fingerprints easily,” an executive said.
